activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11156
activity.text:
Can i work on this issue?

Estimated Time: 12-03-2025

Approach:
API Error Handler: A custom hook useApiErrorHandler to standardize API error processing.
Form Validation Utilities: A set of reusable Zod schemas for common validations.
Offline Status Detection: A useOnlineStatus hook for managing offline scenarios.
Enhanced Skeleton Loaders: Versatile loading components with multiple variants.
Responsive Container: A component to enforce consistent responsive layouts.
Debounce Hook: A custom hook useDebounce for optimizing input handling.
Environment Variable Type Safety: Improved TypeScript definitions for environment variables.
Internationalization Support: Integration of i18n for all new components.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10478
activity.text:
I'm Ashwin, a developer with over 3 years of experience working with React. I went through the project description and found it really exciting, especially knowing that my contributions can have a real-world impact. As I’m new to this organization, I’d love to start by tackling some good first issues before moving on to more advanced challenges.

Could someone please point me in the right direction?

Thanks for your help, and I'm looking forward to contributing!
